Name: FFV Steam Advance GBA OST Mod
Author: AlterPayot
Description:
This mod replaces FFV Steam OST with Advance GBA OST. All tracks are looped in the game and in the music player.

About the GBA tracks

    Tracks came from MIDIs ripped by GBAMusRiper. Some MIDIs have been modified.
    Used XMPlay to convert MIDIs to WAVs.
    Tracks sample interpolation is linear.
    Tracks doesn't have reverb and chorus effects.
